abilities.name: Dark Condition
abilities.effect: As long as Rocket's Entei ex has any Darkness Energy attached to it, Rocket's Entei ex has no Weakness."

attacks.name: Energy Link
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for an Energy card and attach it to Rocket's Entei ex.

attacks.name: Volcanic Ash
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Energy attached to Rocket's Entei ex and then choose 1 of your opponent's Pok��mon. This attack does 60 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
